item.title: Getting started with AI agents (part 1): Capturing processes, roles and connections
item.description: To get started with AI agents, we must first identify differences between agents and models and define roles and communication requirements.

item.title: AI2 closes the gap between closed-source and open-source post-training
item.description: Ai2 released Tülu 3, a model that makes fine-tuning open-source LLMs easier and get its performance closer to closed LLMs like GPT-4o.

item.title: Chinese researchers unveil LLaVA-o1 to challenge OpenAI’s o1 model
item.description: LLaVA-o1 breaks down the answer into multiple reasoning components and uses inference-time scaling to optimize each stage.

item.title: Amazon doubles down on Anthropic, positioning itself as a key player in the AI arms race
item.description: Amazon strengthens its position in the AI race with an additional $4 billion investment in Anthropic, committing to custom silicon and cloud dominance...

item.title: Lightricks bets on open-source AI video to challenge Big Tech
item.description: Lightricks releases LTXV, a breakthrough open-source AI model that generates professional-quality videos in real-time on consumer hardware, challengin...
